---
title: "Reading the Apple stock price from using tidyquant"
output: html_notebook
author: Martin Summer
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
---

```{r, message = F}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyquant)
library(xlsx)
```

```{r read-apple-price}
aapl_prices  <- tq_get("AAPL", get = "stock.prices", from = " 1990-01-01")
```

```{r}
aapl_prices
```
```{r write-apple-stock-csv}
write_csv(aapl_prices, "~/Presentations/Belgrade_Probability_Lectures/Lectures_2023/data/aapl_prices.csv")
write.xlsx(aapl_prices, "~/Presentations/Belgrade_Probability_Lectures/Lectures_2023/data/aapl_prices.xlsx")
saveRDS(aapl_prices, "~/Presentations/Belgrade_Probability_Lectures/Lectures_2023/data/aapl_prices.RDS")
```
